en.chooseservice: Choose from a selection of services to enrich your stay with us.
en.Flowerdes: Order beautiful flowers to your room.
en.Securitydes: Feeling threatened? Order security to your location.
en.Medicinedes: Order your prescribed medications to your room.
en.GiftDes: Get your friend a gift, you can even have it wrapped!
en.Roomdes: Schedule a room for your needs.
en.Devicedes: Request a device for your patient.
en.aboutusdes1: We are the Emerald Ewoks, a team of students taking Software Engineering at Worcester Polytechnic Institute.
en.aboutusdes2: WPI Computer Science Department | CS3733-D24 Software Engineering | Professor Wilson Wong
en.aboutusdes3: Many thanks to our Team Coach, Keira Schoolcraft
en.aboutusthank1: Thank you to the Brigham and Women's Hostpital and Andrew Shinn for providing us with the opportunity to work on this project.
en.aboutusthank2: The Brigham and Women's Hospital maps used in this application are copyrighted and provided for the sole use of educational purposes.
en.ComputerBioinformatics: Computer Science / Bioinformatics and Computational Biology
en.Electrical: Electrical and Computer Engineering / Robotics Engineering
en.Creditdes: This project was made possible with the help of the following software:
en.Creditthank: Special thanks to the creators of these tools for their invaluable contributions to our project.

ch.chooseservice: 从一系列服务中进行选择，丰富您在我们这里的住宿体验。
ch.Flowerdes: 将美丽的鲜花送到您的房间。
ch.Securitydes: 感觉受到威胁？将安全订单发送到您的位置。
ch.Medicinedes: 将您的处方药物送到您的房间。
ch.GiftDes: 为您的朋友选择一份礼物，甚至可以包装好！
ch.Interpretdes: 满足您的所有语言口译需求。
ch.Sanitationdes: 满足您的所有清洁需求。
ch.Roomdes: 为您的需求安排一个房间。
ch.Devicedes: 为您的患者请求一台设备。
ch.aboutusdes1: 我们是 Emerald Ewoks，是伍斯特理工学院软件工程专业的一群学生。
ch.aboutusdes2: WPI 计算机科学系 | CS3733-D24 软件工程 | Wilson Wong教授
ch.aboutusdes3: 非常感谢我们的团队教练Keira Schoolcraft
ch.aboutusthank1: 感谢伯明翰妇女医院和 Andrew Shinn 为我们提供了参与该项目的机会。
ch.aboutusthank2: 本应用程序中使用的伯明翰妇女医院地图受版权保护，仅供教育目的使用。
ch.ComputerBioinformatics: 计算机科学 / 生物信息学与计算生物学
ch.ComputerRobotics: 计算机科学 / 机器人工程
ch.Electrical: 电气与计算机工程 / 机器人工程
ch.Data Science: 计算机科学 / 数据科学
ch.Lorenzo Manfredi Segato: 洛伦佐·曼弗雷迪·塞加托
ch.Creditdes: 该项目是在以下软件的帮助下实现的：
ch.Creditthank: 特别感谢这些工具的创建者为我们的项目做出的宝贵贡献。
ch.Take a slight right and continue for: 向稍微向右转，继续行走
ch.Take a slight left and continue for: 向稍微向左转，继续行走
ch.Take a sharp right into building: 向右急转弯进入建筑物
ch.Take a sharp left into building: 向左急转弯进入建筑物
ch.units of distance until you reach: 单位距离，直到达到您的目的地
